rows.label: qst650407_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, my sweet babies...
I'm so happy to see you!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0002
rows.name: Hi, Mum!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0003
rows.name: Mummy!!!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh... *sniff, sniffle* Don't ever
scare me like that again, all right?

rows.label: qst650407_msg0005
rows.name:
My family's back together,
all thanks to you.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't know how I'll ever
repay you. How would you
like to stay for dinner?

rows.label: qst650407_msg0007
rows.name:
It'll be a bit thrown-together, but
you'll be the guests of honor!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, if you insist! I don't think
we can turn down a hot meal.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0009
rows.name:
Tora so hungry, could eat meal of
any temperature between freezing
and scalding and not say word!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0010
rows.name: Here, let me give you a hand.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0011
rows.name: I'll help out too!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0101
rows.name: You did great out there today, Hibana.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0102
rows.name: No, no, you know that's not true...

rows.label: qst650407_msg0103
rows.name:
I lost my head and charged in without
thinking, and ended up just making
more trouble for everyone...

rows.label: qst650407_msg0104
rows.name:
We all make mistakes, though.
I don't think we could've done
it without you, Hibana.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0105
rows.name:
Especially that last part! If
you hadn't stepped in, we'd
have been in real hot water.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0106
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0107
rows.name:
It's all thanks to your
fierce and caring heart.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0108
rows.name: Ohhhhhh, Homura! My hero!!!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0109
rows.name: Does this mean I'm more like you now?

rows.label: qst650407_msg0110
rows.name:
Uhm... Yes, well, maybe
by a degree or two?

rows.label: qst650407_msg0111
rows.name: Oh, what? That's it?!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0112
rows.name:
I can't believe my hero
would tease me like that...

rows.label: qst650407_msg0113
rows.name: Hahahah!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0114
rows.name:
Next time I'll try even
harder, so you'll HAVE to
acknowledge me as an equal!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0201
rows.name:
You might have messed up a bit,
but without you there, Hibana, I
don't think we could've done it.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0202
rows.name:
When it came to rescuing Nascion,
we'd have been stumped without you.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0203
rows.name: Yep, you really handed it to 'em! Haha!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0301
rows.name:
Admittedly, mistakes were made.
However, it is an undisputable fact
that the children owe you their lives.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0302
rows.name:
As I said before, it was a
perfectly crafted diversionary
tactic that you deployed.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0303
rows.name: And it was quite a spectacle indeed...

rows.label: qst650407_msg0401
rows.name:
So you made a blunder! Big whoop.
I tell you this: without you, even
Zeke would've been at wits' end.

rows.label: qst650407_msg0402
rows.name:
And especially when it came to
the final push, you were a great
asset to the operation, Hibana!

rows.label: qst650407_msg0403
rows.name: Bwahahahaha!
